resources.name: Players
resources.description: Folder containing requests made to the Player table within the NFL Database

resources.name: MLB
resources.description: This folder contains the endpoins that communicate with the MLB database

resources.name: Microservice
resources.description: This API Doc contains examples of the responses from my Microservice API that is in communication with my AWS Server Hosting my MySQL Databases for NFL, MLB, and NBA data. These docs just show that the requests are made successfully to the expected databases along with the data retireval. Also making additional API calls to the Team databases within the Player services to get team data for the player or players when applicable to show team data. All of these requests are made through my API Gateway located at port 8999 of my localhost. I have a Service Registry that utilizes Spring Eureka to display the health of the endpoints for my different servers with connections to different databases.

resources.name: Get Players By Team
Get Players By Name
resources.description:
Returns all players whose names contain the string passed as the request parameter which is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this request

```response
[
  {
    "id": 20,
    "team": "ari",
    "jersey_number": "53",
    "name": "Christian Walker",
    "position": "Position"
  },
  {
    "id": 46,
    "team": "atl",
    "jersey_number": "55",
    "name": "Chris Martin",
    "position": "Pitcher"
  },
  {
    "id": 90,
    "team": "bal",
    "jersey_number": "75",
    "name": "Chris Ellis",
    "position": "Pitcher"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Player and Team
Get Player By Id
resources.description:
Returns player by the ID passed by request parameter

```response
{
  "id": 10,
  "team": "ari",
  "jersey_number": "36",
  "name": "Tyler Clippard",
  "position": "Pitcher"
}
```

resources.name: Add New Player
resources.description:
Creates and inserts a new player into the Player database by way of a request body and returns new team object as repsonse

```response
{
  "id": 2407,
  "team": "nyy",
  "jersey_number": "8",
  "name": "Deshaun Kembal",
  "position": "Pitcher"
}
```

resources.name: Update A Player
resources.description:
Finds a player row by the "id" field inside the request body and uses the rest of the fields in the body to alter the rows data according to field name. Returns the updated team object as response

```response
{
  "id": 2407,
  "team": "nyy",
  "jersey_number": "8",
  "name": "Johnny Mills",
  "position": "Pitcher"
}
```

resources.name: Delete Player
resources.description:
Passing the "id" of a player into the end of the uri path deletes that team from the database and returns the player object as a response

```response
{
  "id": 2407,
  "team": "nyy",
  "jersey_number": "8",
  "name": "Johnny Mills",
  "position": "Pitcher"
}
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Division
resources.description:
Returns all teams that are in the specified division which is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this reuqest, if the leauge abbreviation is not used then it matches any "west" team regardless of "AL" or "NL"

```response
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "team_name": "Arizona Diamondbacks",
    "team_abr": "ari",
    "conference": "National League",
    "division": "NL West"
  },
  {
    "id": 9,
    "team_name": "Colorado Rockies",
    "team_abr": "col",
    "conference": "National League",
    "division": "NL West"
  },
  {
    "id": 11,
    "team_name": "Houston Astros",
    "team_abr": "hou",
    "conference": "American League",
    "division": "AL West"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Conference and Division
resources.description:
Returns teams based on conference and division, this endpoint utitlizes the properties within the path uri following "conference" and "division" then passes them into an SQL query through JPA repo to retireve the data.

```response
[
  {
    "id": 2,
    "team_name": "Atlanta Braves",
    "team_abr": "atl",
    "conference": "National League",
    "division": "NL East"
  },
  {
    "id": 15,
    "team_name": "Miami Marlins",
    "team_abr": "mia",
    "conference": "National League",
    "division": "NL East"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Add New Team
resources.description:
Using the request body, a user can create a new team which is saved into the database, returns new team object as repsonse

```response
{
  "id": 31,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "abc",
  "conference": "National League",
  "division": "NL East"
}
```

resources.name: Update A Team
resources.description:
A user can update a team by specifing the "id" within the request body followed by the fields and data, in a map, that they wish to update. Returns the updated team object as response

```response
{
  "id": 31,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "alc",
  "conference": "National League",
  "division": "NL East"
}
```

resources.name: Delete Team
resources.description:
Passing the "id" of a team into the end of the uri path deletes that team from the database and returns the team object as a response

```response
{
  "id": 31,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "alc",
  "conference": "National League",
  "division": "NL East"
}
```

```response
  "position": "QB"
}
```

resources.name: Get All Teams
resources.description:
Returns all the rows of teams from the database

```response
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "team_name": "Arizona Cardinals",
    "team_abr": "ari",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },

    "conference": "AFC",
    "division": "North"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Teams
resources.description: Folder containing requests made to the Team table within the NFL Database

resources.name: Get Teams By Name
resources.description:
Returns teams whose names contain the string that was passed into the request parameter, the string is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this reuqest

```response
[
    {
    "id": 19,
    "team_name": "New England Patriots",
    "team_abr": "nwe",
    "conference": "AFC",
    "division": "East"
  },
  {
    "id": 20,
    "team_name": "New Orleans Saints",
    "team_abr": "nor",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "South"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Abbreviation
resources.description:
Returns the teams whose abbreviated names contain the string passed into the request parameter, the string is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this reuqest

```response
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "team_name": "Arizona Cardinals",
    "team_abr": "ari",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },
  {
    "id": 5,
    "team_name": "Carolina Panthers",
    "team_abr": "car",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "South"
  },
  {
    "id": 29,
    "team_name": "Los Angeles Rams",
    "team_abr": "lar",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Team By Abbreviation
resources.description:
The string is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve row that matches the parameter

```response
{   
  "id": 21,
  "team_name": "NY Giants",
  "team_abr": "nyg",
  "conference": "NFC",
  "division": "East"
}
```

resources.name: Get Team By Id
resources.description:
Returns the team data with the specified id from the request parameter

```response
{
  "id": 1,
  "team_name": "Arizona Cardinals",
  "team_abr": "ari",
  "conference": "NFC",
  "division": "West"
}
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Conference
resources.description:
Returns all teams in the specified conference from the request parameter which is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this reuqest

```response
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "team_name": "Arizona Cardinals",
    "team_abr": "ari",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },

  {
    "id": 5,
    "team_name": "Carolina Panthers",
    "team_abr": "car",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "South"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Division
resources.description:
Returns all teams that are in the specified division which is passed into an SQL query within the JPA repo to retrieve rows that fit this reuqest, if the leauge abbreviation is not used then it matches any "west" team regardless of "AL" or "NL"

```response
[
  {
    "id": 4,
    "team_name": "Buffalo Bills",
    "team_abr": "buf",
    "conference": "AFC",
    "division": "East"
  },
  {
    "id": 9,
    "team_name": "Dallas Cowboys",
    "team_abr": "dal",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "East"
  },
  {
    "id": 17,
    "team_name": "Miami Dolphins",
    "team_abr": "mia",
    "conference": "AFC",
    "division": "East"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Get Teams By Conference and Division
resources.description:
Returns teams based on conference and division, this endpoint utitlizes the properties within the path uri following "conference" and "division" then passes them into an SQL query through JPA repo to retireve the data.

```response
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "team_name": "Arizona Cardinals",
    "team_abr": "ari",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },
  {
    "id": 27,
    "team_name": "San Francisco 49ers",
    "team_abr": "sfo",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },
  {
    "id": 28,
    "team_name": "Seattle Seahawks",
    "team_abr": "sea",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  },
  {
    "id": 29,
    "team_name": "Los Angeles Rams",
    "team_abr": "lar",
    "conference": "NFC",
    "division": "West"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Add New Team
resources.description:
Using the request body, a user can create a new team which is saved into the database, returns new team object as repsonse

```response
{
  "id": 34,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "abc",
  "conference": "NFC",
  "division": "West"
}
```

resources.name: Update A Team
resources.description:
A user can update a team by specifing the "id" within the request body followed by the fields and data, in a map, that they wish to update. Returns the updated team object as response

```response
{
  "id": 34,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "alc",
  "conference": "NFC",
  "division": "West"
}
```

resources.name: Delete Team
resources.description:
Passing the "id" of a team into the end of the uri path deletes that team from the database and returns the team object as a response

```response
{
  "id": 34,
  "team_name": "Albany Cantalopes",
  "team_abr": "alc",
  "conference": "NFC",
  "division": "West"
}
```
